text:
unless otherwise specified in applicable national legislation:
(a) a person in the workforce suffers a heart attack while at work that it is not connected
with work;
(b) a person in the workforce driving to or from work is injured in a car accident (when driving
is not part of the work and where the transport has not been organised by the
undertaking); and
(c) a person in the workforce with epilepsy has a seizure at work that is not connected with
work.
